name: Just A Prank (MetalBreaker)
description:
A game I made in about 2 days for the Community Game Jam.

Controls:
A, D - move left and right
Spacebar - jump

You can also use the spacebar to skip dialogue while it is being written out.
You can climb on walls by sticking to them with the movement buttons and jumping.
Source is available on GitHub: https://github.com/MetalBreaker/just-a-prank-cgj
